alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Duval County through 715 PM EDT... At 644 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Normandy, or 7 miles west of Jacksonville, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Cisco Gardens, Ortega, Normandy, San Marco, Riverside, Jacksonville Heights and Whitehouse Air Field. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
